motd: This build's key new feature is the reintroduction of the queue in Sonarr with expanded functionality including being able to view and manage queued content from the episode sheet itself!

changes: (Episode Sheet) Show the absolute episode number when available
(Episode Sheet) Show queue tile when the episode has queued releases
(Releases) Ability to sort by preferred word score
(Series Details) Ability to pull-to-refresh series on the season list
(Queue) Re-added ability to view all queued releases
(Queue) Option to remove from download client and add to blocklist on remove
(Icons) Ensure all icons are of the "rounded" family
(List Tiles) Improve consistency in padding between different tile sizes
(Files) Could fail to load with files without media information
(Queue) Check monitored download status on pull to refresh
(Releases) Correctly display negative preferred word scores
(Updates) Checking for updates could fail in some cases
(List Tiles) Fix cases where trailing icons were not vertically centered in collapsed tiles
